value.halfverse: shout to God with a cry of joy.
value.verse: Clap your hands, all you peoples; *

value.halfverse: he is the great King over all the earth.
value.verse: For the LORD Most High is to be feared; *

value.halfverse: and the nations under our feet.
value.verse: He subdues the peoples under us, *
He chooses our inheritance for us, *
value.halfverse: the pride of Jacob whom he loves.

value.verse: God has gone up with a shout, *
value.halfverse: the LORD with the sound of the ramâ€™s-horn.

value.verse: Sing praises to God, sing praises; *
value.halfverse: sing praises to our King, sing praises.
sing praises with all your skill.
value.verse: For God is King of all the earth; *

value.halfverse: God sits upon his holy throne.

value.verse: The nobles of the peoples have gathered together *
value.halfverse: with the people of the God of Abraham.

value.verse: The rulers of the earth belong to God, *
